items.sentence: Why didn\'t you just ask someone for directions?
Don\'t be afraid. It\'ll only hurt for a second.
Tom lost everything and now lives on the street.
Tom made a fool of himself in front of everyone.
Don\'t worry. I\'m not going to tell the police.
Tom has been trying to read the Bible in French.
Tom has until October 20th to finish the report.
Tom asked Mary what she wanted for her birthday.
The explanation Tom gave was easy to understand.
The file that I need seems to have been deleted.
The only foreign language I can speak is French.
We were caught in a shower on the way to school.
She held him tightly and never wanted to let go.
She hurt her foot when she fell off her bicycle.
She listens to him even though no one else does.
She obeys him no matter what he tells her to do.
Tom realized Mary was deliberately avoiding him.
I can\'t believe that we\'ve actually done this.
How old were you when you began to study French?
I asked Tom if he knew anyone who taught French.
